name: Comparaencasa.com
tag_list: car-insurance, travel-insurance, personal-loans, credit-cards, cheap-hotels, cheap-flights
overview:
Comparaencasa.com is a meta tag search engine which aggregates suppliers of services in industries such as travel, finance and insurance for the Latin American markets. The company is headquartered in UK and has received seed funding by UK investors. Argentina and Brazil are operational and running.

In the insurance industry the company offers to its users the opportunity to search and compare car insurances, giving them the possibility of saving money by finding the best quotes. Then resolving their car insurances online without moving away from their homes or offices. The recently added vertical of travel insurance save the users money by comparing and making good decisions. The site compares the most well known insurance companies in the market.

The financial vertical of the website adds same deal of value to its users. At no cost, the visitors of Comparaencasa can search for the best personal loans by matters of seconds and compare the market. Ordering the results by interest rate, total finance costs, etc.; the users can find the best loans available. They can also compare mortgages and credit cards and apply for loans online.

Also, Comparaencasa helps all users search and find the best hotel prices, flights deals and local buses for an easy trip and enjoyable stay.
